summary: After using their powers to battle the forces of darkness, the sisters settle down to lead normal lives. However, the discovery that their biological father may not be dead, but residing in New York, causes confusion for the pair.
cast: Tia Mowry-Hardrict|Tamera Mowry-Housley|Kristen Wilson|Patrick Fabian|Leslie Seiler|Pat Kelly|Karen Holness|Arnold Pinnock|Nathan Stephenson|Chris Gallinger|Jackie Rosenbaum|David Ndaba|Jayne Eastwood|Kevin Jubinville|Anna Hardwick|Donna Croce|Chico the Donkey|Joe Cappelletti|Harrison Hapin|Laura Summer
title: Las gemelas vuelven a hechizar
